pong

Class PongModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • pong.PongModel

  • public class PongModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the model of the simple Pong game. It holds the properties of the ball, paddle, and PongPanel. It also determines the movement of the ball.
    Author:
    Tom Bylander
